videoSnippet.title: Everything is Hanging! || Shirov vs Firouzja || Grand Swiss (2021)
videoSnippet.description:

Photos by Lennart Ootes! (mostly)

Shirov, Alexei (2659) - Firouzja, Alireza (2770)
FIDE Chess.com Grand Swiss (chess24.com) [6] 2021.11.01
B12 Caro-Kann, advance variation

1.e4 c6 2.d4 d5 3.e5 Bf5 4.h4 h5 5.Bd3 Bxd3 6.Qxd3 Qa5+ 7.Nd2 e6 8.Nf3 Nh6 9.O-O Nf5 10.Nb3 Qa6 11.Qd1 Be7 12.Bg5 Bxg5 13.Nc5 Qb6 14.Nxg5 Na6 15.Nxa6 Qxa6 16.c3 Nxh4 17.g3 Nf5 18.Kg2 Qb6 19.b4 Qd8 20.Qd2 Qe7 21.Rab1 Rh6 22.Rh1 O-O-O 23.b5 cxb5 24.Rxb5 h4 25.g4 h3+ 26.Kf1 Rg6 27.gxf5 Rxg5 28.fxe6 fxe6 29.Rxh3 Rf5 30.c4 dxc4 31.Qc3 Rdf8 32.Qxc4+ Kb8 33.Rb2 Qf7 34.Qe2 Qc7 35.Qc2 Qd7 36.Rhb3 b6 37.Qc5 Qb7 38.Rxb6 axb6 39.Rxb6 Rxf2+ 40.Ke1 Rf1+ 41.Ke2 R1f2+ 42.Ke1 Rf1+ 43.Ke2
